challenges.title: Mindful Morning
challenges.description: Spend 5 minutes in mindful breathing or meditation upon waking.

challenges.title: Pause Before Reacting
challenges.description: Pause for 3 seconds before responding in any conversation today.

challenges.title: Neutral Face Practice
challenges.description: Practice keeping a neutral face during casual conversations.

challenges.title: Reduce Nervous Laughter
challenges.description: Notice moments you laugh automatically and consciously stop once.

challenges.title: Slow Speech
challenges.description: Speak slightly slower than usual in conversations today.

challenges.title: Eye Contact
challenges.description: Maintain eye contact for 2–3 seconds while listening.

challenges.title: One Thought Check
challenges.description: Catch one negative thought and let it pass without reacting.

challenges.title: Calm Breathing Reset
challenges.description: Do 5 slow breaths when you feel excited or distracted.

challenges.title: Short Answers
challenges.description: Avoid over-explaining. Answer briefly when possible.

challenges.title: Posture Awareness
challenges.description: Check posture twice and correct it calmly.

challenges.title: No Apology Filter
challenges.description: Do not apologize unless you truly made a mistake.

challenges.title: Silence Tolerance
challenges.description: Allow silence in a conversation without filling it.

challenges.title: Controlled Humor
challenges.description: Laugh only when you genuinely find something funny.

challenges.title: Delayed Response
challenges.description: Delay responding to a message or comment by 2 minutes.

challenges.title: One Boundary
challenges.description: Say no to one small request you don’t want to do.

challenges.title: Neutral Reaction to Teasing
challenges.description: Respond neutrally to teasing without defending yourself.

challenges.title: Calm Under Attention
challenges.description: Stay calm when attention is on you.

challenges.title: Emotional Labeling
challenges.description: Identify one emotion you felt today without judging it.

challenges.title: No Justifying
challenges.description: State your opinion once without explaining further.

challenges.title: Focus Block
challenges.description: Focus on one task for 20 minutes without switching.

challenges.title: Respectful Disengage
challenges.description: Exit a conversation calmly when it becomes unproductive.

challenges.title: Insult Control
challenges.description: If insulted, respond calmly or not at all. No emotional reaction.

challenges.title: Status Neutrality
challenges.description: Treat everyone equally regardless of status.

challenges.title: Delayed Gratification
challenges.description: Delay a small pleasure for at least 30 minutes.

challenges.title: Calm in Conflict
challenges.description: Remain calm in a tense situation without raising voice.

challenges.title: Non-Reactive Listening
challenges.description: Listen fully without interrupting or correcting.

challenges.title: Self-Validation
challenges.description: Do not seek approval or reassurance today.

challenges.title: Controlled Presence
challenges.description: Stay composed and steady regardless of environment.
